Translations.Text: Zapamatat Si ona pouzivat bol few oppressed fearing ze ludia chmatnut ona He granted ona zaistit sanctuary supported ona Jeho victory zadovazit ona dobry provisions ona bol appreciative
O ona verit nie zradit GOD posol nie zradit those trust ona ihned ze ona zauzlit
Ona zauzlit ze tvoj peniaze tvoj dieta bol test GOD possesses velky recompense
O ona verit ona reverence GOD He enlighten ona remit tvoj zhresit forgive ona! GOD possesses infinite grace
disbelievers zapletka kut plany neutralize ona kill ona banish ona! However they zapletka kut plany so robit GOD GOD JE LEPSIE schemer
When our revelations recited them they say My heard If my chudoba my said same things! These je ziaden inak than tales z minuly
They i said Our god this je skutocne truth Ona potom lejak us rocks sky pour us painful punishment
GOD nie bol punish them chvila ona bol ich midst; GOD nie bol punish them chvila they seeking forgiveness
